title: Hot air balloons rise in the sky during the International Hot-Air Balloon festival in Pokhara | National News | kpvi.com
text:
Hot air balloons rise in the sky during the International Hot-Air Balloon festival in Pokhara
- PRAKASH MATHEMA
- Updated
[0](/news/national_news/hot-air-balloons-rise-in-the-sky-during-the-international-hot-air-balloon-festival-in/image_8aa392fc-d72e-5441-91d8-2c101d6599b6.html#comments)
Tags
As featured on
With Nepal's snowy Himalayan peaks as a backdrop, the sky above Pokhara transformed into a vibrant canvas of colours for the country's first hot-air balloon festival.
